name: AmputaTed
description:
A short 2D platformer where Ted is trying to find his lost legs. He has to retrieve them from the lab, run by the evil doctor Amputa! Move your mouse to bounce your way through these levels.

Made by:

Guus Knol

Berend Driessens

Quint Pieters

Joost Grijpma

Dion Peek

To install/play: download file, unzip folder (Extract in Windows, Unpack in WinRAR or 7Zip,) -> when unzipped, open Amputated -> Release -> Amputed.exe (Yes the actual game file is spelled wrong, we're sorry).
